features: SMALL COMPUTER DESK : Dimension is 39.4'' L x 19.7'' W x 29.5''H , short desk, space saving, great for student teens kids writing desk for bedroom or adult home office workstation. The desk is USPTO Patent Approved.

MODERN SIMPLE STYLE DESIGN: Computer desk with 2-tier open fabric drawers and one shelf for storage, providing plenty of room for under-desk storage and organization. You can try this two installation methods (left or right). This splice board desk is made of thick P2 particle wood board with scratch-resistant, anti-collision and waterproof, protect home office desk surface from daily wear and tear.

STURDY STRUCTURE: Extra fixed steel brackets and adjustable leg pads provide greater stability, ensure the desktop is level, non-slip & anti-scratch protectors under the legs to protect your floor from scratching and reducing noises when moving.
EASY ASSEMBLE: A detailed instruction manual and tool are provided, no other tools required, quick and easy to assemble, about 20 - 30 minutes.

2 YEARS WARRANTY GUARANTEE: Provides professional customer service,easy and fast replacement is guaranteed if have quality problem in 2 years, please feel free conct us if any question for this little desk.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 40 inch Computer Desk With Fabric Drawers for Small Space WORK AND WRITING PC DESK Small desk is space-saving, Great for kids and adults, such as students, gamers and work from home designers, writers and business professionals

Reversible Storage Shelf & Easy Installation The table with reversible design, the shelving units of the desks can be fixed on the left or right side according to the workplace, so it can maximize the small space.
Two-Tier Fabric Drawers Spacious storage space for organization, Practical design keeps the space tidy.

Easy Assembly & Storage Capacity * Desk is light-weight, and easy to put together. * Small computer desks, white color, simple style, offer large leg spaces, with storage bag for document or books holder addons * Desk is smooth to the touch and a good thickness to make it feel solid. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute for my 9 year old.
reviews.reviewText: It's not as sturdy as a wooden desk, but my 9 year old loves it. Big enough to put stuff on it and still do homework. The pouch on the side holds lots of things. The drawers again are not as sturdy as slide drawers, but they aren't packed, so it works for her. She loves it. I would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sturdy and aesthetic
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my 14 yr old daughter for her room. It fit perfectly in a smaller pace and she uses it for schoolwork and her makeup of course. It’s very sturdy and the boxes hold a lot. It was so easy to assemble she nearly did it all by herself I just had to help with the box slot rails. Highly recommended this desk for teens!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice but kind of cheap quality.
reviews.reviewText: Nice desk for my 10 yo daughter. Though not the nicest piece of furniture and definitely cheap quality. The legs are made out of metal but the rest is cheap particle board and drawers are like foldable cardboard boxes covered in cheap material with just a thin piece of wood in the front.It serves its purpose I guess.It was easy to assemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected
reviews.reviewText: I don't know how hard it was to assemble as a friend did the job (it looked complicated to me). I absolutely love the desk. It's sturdy and well made. The color is beautiful. The little drawers are nice and it's the perfect size for my laptop with plenty of space to do my school work. Definitely happy with my purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little desk!
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical that a sub $100 desk was going to be any good.I am pleasantly surprised! The assembly was straightforward and did not have any surprises. It holds the laptop, 2 monitors, a keyboard and mouse with no problems.My initial complaint was with the fabric drawers, but they’re holding up just fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Bought two desks, both have serious Issues
reviews.reviewText: First desk: the holes in the bottom of the desk top did not line up with the frame, so half the desk isn't screwed down.Second desk: the side support bar is missing the piece that the screw screws into, so I wasn't able to install it. The bottom drawer pushes the supports for the top drawer out of place. The shelf was dented.Both desks: FYI, the desk top is two pieces, not a solid piece. Due to screws sticking out in the back from the upper frame, the top drawer cannot be pushed all the way in. I ended up cutting spaces for the screws. The top drawer front comes up too high and you have to push hard to fully close the drawer. The screws for the side baskets are too short. I fully expect it to fall frequently. The drawer supports pop out of place if you remove the drawer. Why I'm not returning them... because I'm a good problem solver, my daughters like them, and they will do, but I DO NOT recommend anyone else purchase them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great buy for price
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble and very sturdy for the price. My favorite part is that no matter how much my daughter seems to make a mess on it, it wipes right off with a cleaning agent. These are kids markers, but they have stuck to other surfaces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pros and Cons
reviews.reviewText: Though I absolutely love the look and feel of this desk, I had some problems with assembly. Two metal pieces of the desk did not have the correct holes drilled in them and I could not figure out how to create the needed screw holes. The desk is together and working ok, but not super stable due to lacking a cross beam. They need to double check their manufacturing to make this desk a bigger success.
